title: The Americans
resume: Two KGB spies pose as an American married couple living in 1980s Washington, D.C.

The Americans: Season 5 Critics Consensus: The Americans brings long-simmering storylines to a boil while heightening the spy-thriller stakes and deepening the domestic drama -- all brought vividly to life by superb performances from its veteran cast. The Americans: Season 4 Critics Consensus: The Americans continues to deliver top-tier spy drama while sending its characters in directions that threaten to destroy their freedoms - and their lives. The Americans: Season 3 Critics Consensus: The Americans ' tautly drawn tension, dispensing thrills of a different ilk this season. The Americans: Season 2 Critics Consensus: The Americans retains all the suspense and action of season one while enhancing the level of excitement... and wigs. The Americans: Season 1 Critics Consensus: The Americans is a spy thriller of the highest order, with evocative period touches and strong chemistry between its leads.
